amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the USDA Inspector General to improve the enforcement of Federal animal fighting laws.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce by $1.2 million, the funding for the Office of the Inspector General, and to increase funding by the same amount for the purpose of enforcing the section of the Animal Welfare Act that deals with combatting animal fighting.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Blumenauer amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
